tool_description: The SecureNPM Score Analysis API provides comprehensive insights on npm package information, including security assessment and scoring. Analyze npm packages with confidence and ensure the security of your project.
name: Secure NPM Analysis API
title: Secure NPM Analysis API

api_list.name: Get NPM package info
api_list.description:
The provided route is designed to retrieve information about npm packages. It serves as an interface to obtain details such as the package name, the current Long-Term Support (LTS) version, a description of the npm package, its npm score, the package's size, and the count of its dependencies.

By making a request to this route, you can gather important information about npm packages, including their latest LTS version, which is useful for ensuring compatibility and stability. Additionally, the description of the npm package allows you to understand its purpose and functionality. The npm score provides an indication of the package's quality and reliability, while the package's size helps you estimate its impact on your project's overall size and performance. Lastly, the count of dependencies informs you of the number of other packages that the analyzed package relies on.

Overall, this route provides a convenient and comprehensive way to retrieve essential information about npm packages, aiding in the evaluation and decision-making process when incorporating them into your projects.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-npm-analysis-api.p.rapidapi.com/analysis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-npm-analysis-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://secure-npm-analysis-api.p.rapidapi.com/analysis"
